shows.title: A Billionaire Love Triangle
shows.description:
Anjali, a determined woman from humble beginnings, re-enters the life of her estranged husband Karan Saxena just as he is about to get engaged to Ria Mittal, the only daughter of a wealthy business family. Her unexpected arrival disrupts the celebrations and exposes the secret past the Mittals were never prepared to face.

As Anjali stands her ground against humiliation and class prejudice, the once-clear lines between truth and lies begin to blur. Karan is torn between the comfort of a powerful alliance with Ria and the haunting reality of his unresolved past with Anjali. Meanwhile, Ria finds herself caught between love, pride, and betrayal.

The story weaves through layers of deception, emotional manipulation, and power struggles, ultimately portraying a woman’s journey to reclaim her voice, dignity, and justice in a world that sought to silence her.
